hall.name: The Grand Hall
hall.description: You are in a dusty, grand hall with a high, vaulted ceiling. A large, ornate door is to the north. A small, wooden door is to the east. A dark hallway stretches to the west.

throne_room.name: The Throne Room
throne_room.description: This must be the throne room. A massive, gilded throne sits atop a dais. The only exit is the large door to the south.

armory.name: The Armory
armory.description: You are in a small armory. Racks that once held swords and shields are now empty. A rusty helmet lies in the corner. The only exit is back to the west.

dark_corridor.name: A Dark Corridor
dark_corridor.description: A dark, narrow corridor stretches before you. It feels damp and cold. You can see a faint light at the far end to the west. You can return to the hall to the east.

library.name: The Old Library
library.description: You've found the source of the light! This is a circular library filled with decaying books. A single, flickering candle sits on a desk. A passage leads back east.
